trans-unit.source: In order to deploy applications to Azure, you need an account.
trans-unit.target: In order to deploy applications to Azure, you need an account.

trans-unit.source: This article describes how to create a free trial account and how to enable Azure preview features, including BizTalk Services, HDInsight, and Azure Back, for the account.
trans-unit.target: This article describes how to create a free trial account and how to enable Azure preview features, including BizTalk Services, HDInsight, and Azure Back, for the account.

trans-unit.source: Open a web browser and browse to <html></html>
trans-unit.target: Open a web browser and browse to <html></html>

trans-unit.source: If you have an MSDN subscription, navigate to the <link><linkText>Azure Benefit for MSDN Subscribers</linkText><title></title></link> page and follow the steps to create an account by activating your MSDN subscriber benefits.
trans-unit.target: If you have an MSDN subscription, navigate to the <link><linkText>Azure Benefit for MSDN Subscribers</linkText><title></title></link> page and follow the steps to create an account by activating your MSDN subscriber benefits.

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, navigate to the <link><linkText>create a free trial account</linkText><title></title></link> page and follow the steps to create a trial account.
trans-unit.target: Otherwise, navigate to the <link><linkText>create a free trial account</linkText><title></title></link> page and follow the steps to create a trial account.

trans-unit.source: You'll need a credit card number and a mobile phone number for proof of identity, but you will not be billed.
trans-unit.target: You'll need a credit card number and a mobile phone number for proof of identity, but you will not be billed.

trans-unit.source: Navigate to <html></html> and sign in with your Azure account.
trans-unit.target: Navigate to <html></html> and sign in with your Azure account.

trans-unit.source: Click preview features to view the available previews.
trans-unit.target: Click preview features to view the available previews.

trans-unit.source: Scroll down to the feature you want to enable and click try it now.
trans-unit.target: Scroll down to the feature you want to enable and click try it now.

trans-unit.source: Select your subscription and click the check.<html></html>
trans-unit.target: Select your subscription and click the check.<html></html>
